org.apache.poi.xwpf.usermodel

Class XWPFStyles

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.poi.ooxml.POIXMLDocumentPart
      • org.apache.poi.xwpf.usermodel.XWPFStyles

  • public class XWPFStyles
extends POIXMLDocumentPart
    Holds details of built-in, default and user styles, which apply to tables / paragraphs / lists etc. Text within one of those with custom stylings has the style information stored in the XWPFRun(保存内置、默认和用户样式的详细信息，这些样式适用于表格/段落/列表等。具有自定义样式的其中一个中的文本具有存储在XWPFRun中的样式信息)

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.apache.poi.ooxml.POIXMLDocumentPart

        POIXMLDocumentPart.RelationPart

      • commit

        protected void commit()
               throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from class: POIXMLDocumentPart
        Save the content in the underlying package part. Default implementation is empty meaning that the package part is left unmodified.

        Sub-classes should override and add logic to marshal the "model" into Ooxml4J.

        For example, the code saving a generic XML entry may look as follows:

         protected void commit() throws IOException {
   PackagePart part = getPackagePart();
   OutputStream out = part.getOutputStream();
   XmlObject bean = getXmlBean(); //the "model" which holds changes in memory
   bean.save(out, DEFAULT_XML_OPTIONS);
   out.close();
 }
        (将内容保存在基础包部分中。默认实现为空，这意味着包部分保持未修改。子类应该重写并添加逻辑以将“模型”编入Ooxml 4J。例如，保存通用的HTML条目的代码可能如下所示：受保护的val commit（）引发IOResponse { PackagePart = getPackagePart（）; OutputStream out =部分.getOutputStream（）; DatabObserver bean = getDatabBean（）; //在内存中保存更改的“模型” bean.save，DID_XML_OPTIONS）; out.close（）; })
        Overrides:
        commit in class POIXMLDocumentPart
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - a subclass may throw an IOException if the changes can't be committed(java.io. IOResponse-如果无法提交更改，则子类别可能会引发IOResponse)

        public boolean styleExist(java.lang.String styleID)
        checks whether style with styleID exist(检查是否存在具有styleID的样式)
        Parameters:
        styleID - styleID of the Style in the style-Document(styleID -style-Document中样式的styleID)
        Returns:
        true if style exist, false if style not exist(如果样式存在，则为真，如果样式不存在，则为假)

      • getUsedStyleList

        public java.util.List<XWPFStyle> getUsedStyleList(XWPFStyle style)
        get the styles which are related to the parameter style and their relatives this method can be used to copy all styles from one document to another document(获取与参数样式及其相关的样式该方法可用于将所有样式从一个文档复制到另一个文档)
        Parameters:
        style -(风格-)
        Returns:
        a list of all styles which were used by this method(此方法使用的所有样式的列表)

      • getStyleWithName

        public XWPFStyle getStyleWithName(java.lang.String styleName)
        Get the style with the specified name, if any.(获取具有指定名称的样式（如果有的话）。)
        Parameters:
        styleName - The name of the style to get, e.g., "Heading 1"(styleName -要获取的样式的名称，例如，“标题1”)
        Returns:
        XWPFStyle with the specified name, or null if not found.(具有指定名称的XWPFStyle，如果找不到，则为空。)
